shadow.name: WEAKNESS
shadow.description: Emotional neediness, seeking completion through others
shadow.behavioral_signature: Codependency, unable to function without emotional support
shadow.thought_pattern: I can't do this alone. I need someone to make me whole.

gift.name: EQUALITY
gift.description: Emotional sovereignty that enables genuine partnership
gift.thought_pattern: I am complete. I choose partnership, not neediness.

siddhi.name: TENDERNESS
siddhi.description: Soft strength that holds space for others without losing self
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Gentle power, protective care without control
siddhi.somatic_signature: Strong and soft simultaneously, fierce tenderness
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am strong enough to be gentle. Softness is not weakness.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not incomplete. You are seeking external validation because you haven't established emotional sovereignty. Gate 37 is about family and partnership, but true partnership requires two whole people. Your neediness repels the very connection you seek. Build your emotional center first.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Sit alone. Place hands on solar plexus. Feel your own emotional presence. You are enough.

experiment.hypothesis: If I spend time alone building emotional self-sufficiency, my relationships will improve.
experiment.action: Daily: 30 minutes alone with no external validation. Practice self-soothing. Journal emotional self-sufficiency.

success_criteria.target: Able to be emotionally okay alone, less needing others to regulate you
